Detailed Description

Interface class.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The Interface class defines an generic interface to Simulink with a number of:

  • Inputs. Accessible via u( )
  • Outputs. Accessible via y( )
  • States. Accessible via x( )
  • Parameters. Accessible via param( )
The Interface class is never created, one of its child classes ContinuousInterface or DiscreteInterface is always used

See also:
Sim, InterfaceContainer, ContinuousInterface, DiscreteInterface
